tender.procurementMethodRationale: HBC conducted an open RFQ process to select bidders for the competitive dialogue process
tender.submissionMethodDetails:
Submissions should be made via the council's eTendering portal at
 https://www.the-chest.org.uk/
tender.procurementMethodDetails: The procurement process will be conducted in accordance with the provisions of the Public Contract Regulations 2006 and Council Directive 2004/18/EC relating to the procurement of public works contracts. The procurement competition will be conducted under the competitive dialogue procedure.

 https://www.the-chest.org.uk/
